snippet: The group formally endorsed an initiative to pursue a political solution with the government, provided that President Bashar al-Assad is excluded.
abstract: Syria’s main opposition body formally endorses initiative to pursue political solution through talks with members of Syrian government, provided that Pres Bashar al-Assad and security and military leaders involved in his bloody crackdown are excluded.
lead_paragraph: The group formally endorsed an initiative to pursue a political solution with the government, provided that President Bashar al-Assad is excluded.

headline.seo: Syrian Opposition Group Is Open to Talks, If Assad Is Excluded
headline.main: Syrian Opposition Group Is Open to Talks, With Conditions
headline.print_headline: Syrian Opposition Group Is Open to Talks, With Conditions
